decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - 1.	The proposed extensions, by reason of their cumulative effect in conjunction with structures already on site, their size, design and external appearance, would substantially alter the appearance of the existing dwellinghouse and would be out of scale and character with the property and the surrounding area, contrary to Adopted Unitary Development Plan policies ENV B1.1 and H 6.4 and the Residential Extension Guidelines.

Condition : 2 - The proposed extensions, by reason of their by reason of their cumulative effect in conjunction with structures already on site, their bulk, appearance and excessive size in close proximity to the adjoining property, would have an obtrusive and overbearing effect which would be detrimental to the living conditions of that property by reason of loss of outlook and daylight contrary to Adopted Unitary Development Plan policies ENV-B 1.1 and H 6.4 and the Residential Extension Guidelines
description: Erection of a two-storey side and single storey rear extension to existing house.
